review: Waste of my money. I purchased the Chromecast several months ago for use in my mountain cabin (which has no internet) thinking I could use it to send a signal wirelessly from my computer or phone to watch movies I have stored on them. Not so. You must have wifi internet service in order to use the product. Instead of returning it, I waited until I returned to my "city" home with internet and tried using it again. And it still doesn't work. It says it is connected to my wifi but will not connect to the internet. I give. As far as I'm concerned this thing can be flushed down the toilet.
author: Brenda Piper Stephens "BeaDaNurse"
